entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
